item.description:
From boardgamegeek.com:

"The Complete-the-Lyric Game"

Two or three teams attempt to complete lyrics from popular songs. Players are given the year, the artist, the song title and the first two or three words; if nobody can get it, then more words are revealed.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Will send out my number the day before for those that don't have it, will be in the lobby (ticket sales lobby, not concession stand lobby) at least 30 minutes before the movie starts.
item.name: Game Night: SongBurst 70s & 80s Edition
